summary: Experienced in PLM business consulting area with over 10 years’ experience in automotive, aerospace and warehouse industries in Germany, France, Switzerland, Ireland, Netherlands and Japan. Managed various projects from 3DExperience implementation project, Product Data Migration (EBOM/CAD BOM), Business processes definition, optimization and integration, Product structures optimization, Customer site integration projects, Server migration projects and others. Excellence in communication and relation with stakeholders. Capability to form and lead winning team with great working spirit and leadership. Strong presentation and PLM trainer skills, sharp in planning and timely escalating. Goal oriented, visionary with strategic fulfillment approach. Creative, agile and always finding a way to make things happen.

projects.title: PLM onsite functional support on optimization of product EBOM. Automotive Tier 1 supplier, Ireland.
projects.description:
- Daily support to PTMs and design team on ECR/ECO process and issues, including problem solving on product structures

- Work with client project team on improving product structure EBOM in PLM and improving change management (ECR/ECO) process

- Support on integration between PLM and SAP, for automatic transfer of EBOM into SAP

projects.title: Migration Project, mass EBOM migration from SmarTeam to PLM MatrixOne. Automotive Tier 1 supplier, Tokyo.
projects.description:
Extension of previous data migration project. Goal of this project is to migrate legacy data (product structures) from SmarTeam to PLM MatrixOne. Over 8K products will be migrated. Only several product structures will be proceed with new design change. In order to speed up the migration only EBOM will be migrated while CAD data will be only attached to structure in case of future need.

My responsibilities: project planning, build roadmap with milestones, build technical migration workflow. Track project progress, secure on time deliverables, report results to management, coordinate project team.

contributors.headline: System Administrator at Global Engineering Technologies

projects.title: Migration project, CAD and PLM data from SmarTeam to PLM MatrixOne. Automotive Tier 1 supplier, Tokyo.
projects.description:
Goal of this project is to integrate Tokyo site in Automotive Tier 1 supplier, by mass data migration of product structures, EBOM and CAD BOM, from SmarTeam to PLM, Valeo system. Over 2k EBOM and CAD BOM will be migrated. 

- Exporting/Importing Business Data and Application Data Model
- Exporting/Importing Non-CAD Data
- Exporting/Importing CAD Data overview
- Projects Cleaning after migration and validation to secure clean data structures in system
- Controlling PLM system behavior through migration

contributors.headline: Senior Team Leader @ Valeo | Driving Innovation in Automotive Design

projects.title: PLM and R&D IS separation of CAM from Valeo
projects.description: Leading of separation project of R&D IS and PLM system from Valeo to U-shin CAM.

contributors.headline: MANAGER - PROJECT - PO - PRODUCT OWNER - IT - IS - INFORMATION SYSTEMS TECHNOLOGY

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the configuration management activities in projects and products scope. Working on 3DExperience with project leaders and product architects on product platform configurations, improvements and creation of multidisciplinary releases. Acting as Enovia Key-User by supporting multidisciplinary teams in processes and tooling.

Communicating way of working towards multidisciplinary teams. Detecting problems and proposing improvements through business processes and tooling. Daily cooperating with Configuration Managers of other projects and departments to ensure uniformity. 

Responsible for ALM software configuration management activities. Configuration and maintenance of projects and build plans.  Managing software releases in a version control system. 

CM support on PLM, ALM and Requirements tools:
- Enovia PLM (3DExperience)
- Atlassian (Jira, Bitbucket, Bamboo, Confluence, Artifactory)
- Doors
profile_positions.title: Configuration Manager
PLM/CAx Architect

profile_positions.description:
Working for a leading automotive parts Tier 1 supplier with more than 100 thousand employees on following actives:

Leading PLM team of engineers and consultants with a mission to deliver top quality R&D services and projects for a tier 1 automotive supplier. My role in this multidisciplinary team is to ensure the quality of all delivered services and projects, making sure the communication is perfect on all levels, and taking care of the team – annual appraisals, setting targets, coaching, mentoring, tutoring, etc.

Responsibilities:
•	Project / Service planning and monitoring
•	Client and stakeholders management
•	Identifying project / service resources requirement
•	Staffing teams - recruitment
•	Delegating tasks and responsibilities
•	Leading daily, weekly and monthly meetings
•	Reporting on project progress and communicating project status to stakeholders and senior management
•	Constant improvement of service quality

PLM Expertise:

•	Consult product mangers on creation/revision of Product EBOM structures to be in line with customer requirements and company business rules; Guide project team members through Change Management process and Lifecycle approval tasks; Support designers on creation of CAD BOM structures and assist them in daily work including PLM integration with Catia.

•	Participate in assessment and optimization of PLM processes and Product structures. Writing functional and technical specifications ensuring the relevance and the proper functioning of the proposed solutions through PLM system validations; Writing validation business cases and test scenarios.

•	Develop and deliver weekly and monthly metric reports to support process improvement and data integrity.

•	Maintain relationship and positive atmosphere with all stakeholders of the projects. With 35% of work time spent on customer sites.

•	PLM Enovia Trainer - Providing classroom PLM training for employees in Ireland and Germany. Write and improve existing training documentation;
profile_positions.title: PLM Team Leader

profile_positions.description:
Working for a leading automotive parts Tier 1 supplier with more than 100 thousand employees on  Tokyo product line.

•	Managing PLM Migration Project; Transition from legacy PDM/PLM system to the target PLM system; Providing guidance on planning and executing data migration projects. Drive and coordinate cross functional teams from across the organization for delivery excellent results.

•	Assess the existing data and processes, align with the business requirements, and develop an optimal data migration plan; Ensure high-quality migration results, through migration of only required data and alignment of CAD models, derived drawings, and other related documents as part of the migration, based on customer data and process integrity. Ensure migrated data is readily usable in the target PLM system, with minimal post-migration data cleanup required.

•	On daily basis monitoring and controlling project progress; Leading dedicated project teams; Presenting progress and results to stakeholders; Performing timely escalations; Responsible for understanding macro/micro level requirements as per the specifications; preparing all required documentation.

•	Guiding the best approach towards executing PLM solution for customer and meeting business system and process requirements; Executing large data migration; Developing team members to achieve their performance goals.
profile_positions.title: Technical Project Leader

profile_positions.description:
Working for a leading automotive parts Tier 1 suppliers with more than 100 thousand employees on following actives:

•	Functional consulting - Support users on customer business processes; Collecting user requests; Analyze requirements and propose solutions, making sure that are in line with customer business rules. On daily basis responsible to support users on PLM modules:  Change Management (ECR/ECO); Engineering BOM; CAD BOM; Part and Document Management; Standard Management.

•	Validation of PLM application - Periodically work on test and validation of PLM application when customer deliver new system releases, hot fixes or patches. Responsible for: Building and performing test case scenarios; Reporting progress of PLM validation to customer; Reporting and documenting failure tests in ticketing system; Propose solution for system failure; Propose improvements of business processes.

•	Technical support - On daily basis supporting users on technical problems. Responsible for: Monitoring ticketing system; Accept tickets in timely manner according to SLA; Maintain good communication with end users. As technical support I am working on problems related to: 
o	Part and Document Management, Change Management (ECR/ECO), E-BOM, CAD BOM, Accounts creation, Team management administration.
o	PLM integration tools, Catia V5, PDF generator, OpenDXM, etc.

•	Development of TCL/MQL scripts for: Large amount of data processing; Generation of user requested reports; Legacy data migration scripts and many more.

•	Coordination of team activities for project: R&D IS separation of business groups

o	On daily basis coordinating team activities; Monitoring project progress; Reporting to project manager with timely escalations; Maintain relationship and with stakeholders
profile_positions.title: PLM Consultant
